website_summaries.verdict: A flexible knee strap keeps you from losing this pillow as you toss and turn. And it's removable, if it bothers you.
pros: Comes with pair of memory foam earplugs
cons: Some find the pillow's leg indentations to be a bit too small

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pillow
customer_reviews.text: Another review on here suggested that you gotta have the strap, so I picked this product over several other similar pillows here. And I'm glad I did. I'm working through a temporary back issue, and side-sleeping has become necessary (I'm usually a back-sleeper). This pillow really does the alignment trick, and the best part is, I don't have to strain or adjust to position it correctly, since for now, doing so while also tangling with bedsheets and blanket all while not waking up the wife is difficult, and a little painful. The strap makes everything easier, so I'll also say, you gotta have the strap!
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Well made, the strap is a MUST. Without ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, the strap is a MUST. Without the strap, it ends up who knows where? I no longer have a lower back ache when I get up in the morning. If you are a "side sleeper" you won't regret getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Strap keeps pillow properly positioned when sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The product looks just like the ad. I am a side sleeper that has lower back pain in the morning. I picked this shape because my chiropractor recommended a pillow shaped like an hour glass to help my back. I also chose this pillow because it had a strap that can be adjusted to your leg or completely removed. I have been using the pillow for over a week and my lower back feels much better in the morning. The strap keeps the pillow attached without having to be adjusted when I turn over but I have never used another type so I assume the strap is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knee pillow I've found. It is smaller than a lot of them (approx. 6" x 10") and the narrow section in the center is only about 2 1/2". This works perfectly for me, since I am a smaller person. The foam is much denser than others I have tried and as a result, the foam in the center doesn't get flattened. I really like the adjustable strap to help keep it in place. It also works well if you want to have it a little higher on your leg, such as right above the knee, giving your knee more room to flex/bend. Overall, a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: I just received the contoured pillow yesterday, and used ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the contoured pillow yesterday, and used it last night. I had knee replacement surgery a couple of weeks ago, and sleeping has been a problem when my knees touch. I could tell the difference in sleeping immediately.
customer_reviews.author: John Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and I CAN FINALLY SLEEP BECAUSE ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and I CAN FINALLY SLEEP BECAUSE IT TAKES THE PRESSURE OFF MY HIP BY SUPPORTING MY LEGS AS I SLEEP ON MY SIDE. THANK YOU SINCERELY, RUTH D. BRUNO
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Supportive. Stays on all night.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pillow. I have a herniated disc between L4 - L5 and have attempted for a while to sleep with a pillow between my knees, but it got kicked away most nights. This pillow is amazing. The strap really does keep it on my leg so when I roll over it ends up rolling with me and staying in place, or mostly in place. It is much more stable than just regular pillows as well, so it's more supportive. I'm buying another one for my spouse!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE and LOVE the adjustable strap!
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only had this knee pillow for about a week, it works wonderfully. It feels like it was last a lot longer than my last pillow because the foam seems to be a better quality. Time will tell but I'm very happy with this purchase so far! I love the strap, and even more, that it's adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A.

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Side Sleeper Back Pain!
customer_reviews.text: I love the knee pillow. It is small and compact so it is not cumbersome like trying to place a regular pillow between the knees. The shape of the pillow allows for perfect placement between knees or upwards toward the thigh area. It does help back pain that is caused by the back not being aligned for side sleepers. The cover is removable for washing...that is nice. I am glad I purchased the Everlasting Comfort Memory Foam Knee Pillow. It is functioning as was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gotsch

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow perfect for my hip restrictions - the Velcro doesn’t seem to last long tho
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pillow! It allowed me to sleep in my bed while on strict restrictions after hip surgery - but so have ordered another one because the Velcro is not sticking well anymore - little be the pillow and need it for a while longer
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kraak

customer_reviews.title: The pillow provides wonderful support for the back and it relieves knee pressure
customer_reviews.text: The pillow provides wonderful support for the back and it relieves knee pressure. The strap is a welcome addition to this very comfortable knee pillow as it stays with the leg during repositioning at night. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aanestad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Comfortable and meets my needs
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable-I'm using it when I sit on the couch to support my most painful knee and when I'm sleeping it makes both of ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days. Very comfortable-I'm using it when I sit on the couch to support my most painful knee and when I'm sleeping it makes both of my legs less painful.
customer_reviews.author: LSP  Vaanchard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this item for my knee, my back feels a little better the first time I used it. Thank you for your product. Will let others know.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My cushion is great. It came fast and in great condition. It is very comfortable and nice. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is a nice size, not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to do a product review, until I have used it for awhile. I have now had the pillow for two weeks. I ordered this pillow for my knees have been has been bothering me. It has not only helped my knee, but also my back. I have a small rotator cuff tear and use it to support my arm when I am sitting. The pillow is a nice size, not too big not too small. It is soft, but offers the much needed support. The pillow came arrived very quickly. I received an email making sure the product was satisfactory,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: upper knee joint unsupported = knee pain
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is plenty soft and fits well between the thighs. The problem is that it only supports the thigh, not the knee joint. Thus, after a short time, the knee on the upper leg begins to hurt. So, you trade one pain for another. Not a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: nanciorama

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level
customer_reviews.text: I think.the material is very nice but the pillow is too small to cradle the knees.
customer_reviews.author: debbi lebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Too thick.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is WAY too thick. Im a side sleeper trying to alleviate knee pain and it keeps my legs too far apart from each other to the point where it’s more painful to use the pillow. I’ve tried it between my knees, hips and ankles to try for a better adjustment but it’s still too thick. If it was thinner this would be a homerun
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meltz

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mother primarily because I was made of memory foam. She could not use it even one night - was too stiff. I put it back in the box until I decide what to do with this weird shape. Today I decided to put it away in a closet but before I wanted to examine it and was surprised to discover that it does not have even a hint on MEMORY FOAM more so PURE. Now I have a useless piece of regular foam and have no idea what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: MEzr

customer_reviews.title: I'm better off using my full size pillow again
customer_reviews.text: This flattens as soon as you apply weight from your knees/thighs (i'm 5'4 140lbs). I'm better off using my full size pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: my doctor said these cushions are terrible for you!
customer_reviews.text: This was so uncomfortable - my thighs would not fit the child-size indentations. I took it to my chiropractor and she said "These types of pillows are terrible!" She showed me how this pushes your knees too far apart and then leaves the rest of your leg unsupported - causing extra stress on your hip, ankle, etc. She showed me how to just use a regular size pillow lengthwise, so it supports my knee and whole leg right down to my ankle. SOOO much more comfortable!!!! To keep it in place, I just tie a soft cloth belt or ace bandage around my legs. Presto! And it's FREE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of a future astronaut

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. It would not stay between my legs no matter what I tried. Wish I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: bobmac

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to ease pressure on soon to be replaced bad hip which causes pain to radicate down leg and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to ease pressure on soon to be replaced bad hip which causes pain to radicate down leg and to knee. Comfortable material, though the strap doesn't fit over my large upper legs but overall Memory Foam Knee holds up to the weight of my legs, so far. Wish there was a light weight travel bag vs free ear plugs (no value in them).
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: POS. It was shipped compressed, but when I owned it it NEVER expanded. It's been over 24hrs and still it's not expanded to proper shape! Pointless to use in this shape/condition!
customer_reviews.author: Briannon

customer_reviews.title: and I'm pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Used this last night after I received it yesterday, and I'm pleased so far! I love that it has a secure strap so it stays put all night long. It was really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. Item is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: WRX

customer_reviews.title: Does not look as plump as in the photo :(
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully the pillow expands a bit after a few hours. Right now it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't bend legs comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Product came nicely packaged with a little case and earplugs. The fabric is soft. The pillow is medium-firm. Because of the bell shape on the ends of this product, I was unable to sleep comfortably with my legs bent (fetal position). The bell pushed into the back on my calves. I would say this product would work better for straight legs sleepers. Returning mine. Will look for a rounded knee pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Southern_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent. Arrived on time. I love it! By accident I ordered it twice so I refused delivery on the second one. So happy with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda S Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. Typically I use a regular bed pillow, and it is a bit of a hassle when turning from side to side. It is so much easier to switch it up with this pillow. I would ha e given it an even better rating, but the pillow case is so difficult to remove, and put back on. This issue could have easily been resolved by increasing the length of the zipper. Overall it is good
customer_reviews.author: Sniveb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this knee pillow a few weeks and I can say I’m not impressed. It hasn’t lived up to my expectations. It compresses down to nothing in the center making my knees still pretty much touch. The strap is a great idea to keep it in place and I was pleasantly surprised with that feature as I thought I wouldn’t like it but I did. I just wish the pillow itself was better. I won’t be using it any longer as it isn’t really helping. I think 3 weeks was long enough to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: The strap is a must, but it should be attached differently. The Velcro can scratch you.
customer_reviews.text: Since using this I have experienced mush less pain, which returned if I don’t use it. It’s really comfortable and the strap keeps it in place all night. Now the downside. First, it’s really hard to take the case on and off to wash it. Second, the strap is attached with Velcro which can scratch you or your partner. I’ve tried aligning the straps perfectly on the Velcro l, so it’s covered completely. Unfortunately, I have not been successful. I’m happy with my purchase and I’ll keep it. Once it’s time to replace it, I will be looking for one that isn’t attached with Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: A big help, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how much I like this little knee pillow. I had not expected it to make that much difference or be that comfortable. It looked as if it might be too thick, but it is perfect. It provides so much more comfort and adjusts the position of my hips so that my low back is more comfortable for sleeping. However, I downgraded my review after removing the cover to wash it. It is absurdly difficult to get the cover off an on for cleaning because the zipper opening is too small. It would have been so simple to use a longer zipper. Design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been sleeping with pillows between my legs/knees for a while to help alleviate some aches and pains, but it was kind of frustrating to have to negotiate those all the time - especially since, even on the best mattress, I do need to switch sides a lot as I sleep. This pillow works really well! It's of a nice quality and it's just the right size to do what I need/help with my pain issues without being cumbersome, too hot, etc. The little strap is helpful and knowing that I can easily wash the cover is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: R. GilbertTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Every person is different
customer_reviews.text: This is 100% personalized. The quality of this product is great. Memory foam is nice and soft. I sleep with a pillow in between my legs every night and hoped this help. I tried this for one night and ended up with worse back pain AND a strained hip flexor. I can assume my back pain was due to constant need to flip around and adjust pillow due to inability to get comfortable. If you move a lot in your sleep- I wouldn’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn McLean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, even for big fellas like me.
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam is firm and the pillow is big enough to be enjoyed by a big guy like me. I'm 6'5" and 365 lbs. It seems well made and should stand the test of time. The only downside to this product (and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars) is that it doesn't stay in place if you roll over in the night. I believe this could be remedied if they included an additional velcro attached strap for both legs rather than just one. I often wake up with it behind the leg it is strapped to. If you tend to stay on one side all night, you probably won't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: MdKnightR

customer_reviews.title: It was really nice to have this stay in position all night
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a pillow in between my knees but end up losing it. It was really nice to have this stay in position all night. I was afraid it would be too tight for my chubby leg but it wasn't. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it seemed a tiny bit too high for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Caused worse knee problems
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first, but I noticed it made my lower leg drop at an angle that wasn't natural, torquing my hip and knee. The next morning, I had a hard time walking my knees hurt so bad. I tried it for 3 nights, got the same result: Eacb morning I could hardly walk, my knees were in pain and on fire. I finally slept without it and used a pillow that supported the legs, knees, and ankles. No pain....finally. I watched a video by a chiropractor on why they're bad for hips and knees and it explained the knee pain I was having. Immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy American

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I took the cover off to wash and the zipper broke. It has a very cheap zipper. You have to be very careful taking off cover because you can not fix the zipper on this one because of the material being to thick and fuzzy it will not slide back on.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit you if you’re petite
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a knee pillow that would keep air flow down there for optimal health - I use a normal pillow and it ends up between my thighs which reduces air flow. This unfortunately is just too big to use for someone my size - I’m 4’11” and 130lbs and it’s way too thick. I have to strap the tight so tight that the velcro is exposed and scratches my leg. Woke up with worse back pain than a normal pillow because my leg was way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Too thin in the middle to be effective.
customer_reviews.text: The photos make this look like the middle (which determines how far apart your legs are when you sleep) is at least 2-3 inches thick, if not more. But in practice, after only a couple weeks of use, it kept my legs only about an inch apart, which wasn’t enough to get any real benefits. (I’m fairly skinny, too, so my legs aren’t unreasonably heavy.)
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Won't sleep without it!
customer_reviews.text: Aching back and very sore knees after a hard day burning brush and various chores around our ranch. I ordered this hoping it would work. And it has! Relief from night one. Just keeping the pressure off my knees while I sleep has made all the difference and allowed them to heal. It has also improved back aches due to the proper alignment this pillow provides when in use. Propped just above my knees it stays in place when I turn at night and it is so light weight I forget it's there. This pillow is well worth it and because of the memory foam it hasn't lost it's shape even after over a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Deerwachr

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that helps
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to deal with a low back issue during Covid. About a month ago, one of my dogs on a leash jerked abruptly toward a squirrel. The next day, I noticed a lot of pain in my low back, with discomfort in one leg. I tried to tough it out, tried yoga and various stretches intended to alleviate sciatica or piriformis issues. Things seemed to improve but very slowly. When I ordered this pillow and started using it consistently, I noticed a big leap in healing. Most of the morning tightness and pain during the day are gone. I highly recommend giving this pillow a try.
customer_reviews.author: Itinerant T

customer_reviews.title: It's average
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised. It's good quality. A little smaller than I expected but probably because I didn't look at the specs close enough. I think my sleep quality is the same that it was. It does help my back not to be as sore however if I use it between my knees (while sleeping on my side) it really bothers the knee that is on the bottom. This may just be me trying to figure out the best way to use it for my body shape, not actually a default in the product. Overall I would say it's average or just a little above on how it has worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Velcro gave out within three weeks of using the product.
customer_reviews.text: The first week of using it went well, slept like a baby! Second week was ok, then by week three I began once again feeling the pressure in my knees while sleeping. The pillow is soft, but its too soft. If I can still feel pressure in my knees while using it, then its not doing its job. Super disappointed with this product, it had potential.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband had double knee replacement surgery 3 weeks ago. He was unable to sleep on his side due to pain from when his knees touched. This pillow allowed him to lay on his side and get the sleep he so desperately needed. I have not tried to take the cover off yet to clean it which MAY be a challenge. It does look like a small zipper opening. That is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this simply for comfort, not to relieve any back or knee pain. I'm a side sleeper and found that placing a stiff, large pillow between my legs made sleeping profoundly more comfortable. Unfortunately this doesn't do the job, unless you have very thin, bony legs. This product seems to have been made for a very short, very slender, tiny person.
customer_reviews.author: Dobees#1

customer_reviews.title: Does reshape, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mine came very misshapen, too. Looked awful. Put it between my legs for 20 minutes, tried to get comfortable and sleep. It wasn’t comfortable bc it left me knees and lower legs unsupported and the ridge of the pillow cut into my leg. BUT, it did reshape itself perfectly. I’m 5’3”, 195 lbs, and it compressed to 1.25 inches between my knees. I’m not going to use it. I’ll try to figure out what I can use it for, before I return it, bc I doubt it can be resold, which means it’s landfill waste.
customer_reviews.author: R.Jeschke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable side sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My lower back is fused at 4 levels & it puts a lot of strain on my hip joints when I sleep on my side. This pillow has allowed me to sleep comfortably on my side again. I love the strap because it keeps the pillow in place if I roll over but it doesn't feel like it's even there... has very light pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for side sleepers, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great. The first one had the strap unattached but the company sent me a replacement. It's nice soft foam unlike some of the stiff ones I've ordered from other brands. Highly recommended for side sleepers. The strap helps me not lose it as I roll around in my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: MariantheLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: I like this pillow so much, I pack it in my suitcase for trips
customer_reviews.text: Because of surgery, I have been sleeping on my side a lot lately. I started having hip and upper thigh pain. For some reason I intuitively felt a pillow would help. I used a regular pillow at first between my knees, but I would lose it during the night. With this pillow, I put it on my leg and it follows me all night. My pain is much better. Of course, 6 months of physical therapy has a lot to do with that, as well, but I'm so convinced the pillow is important I take it on vacation with me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have been having sciatic trouble for weeks. Even had shots for it. Went on vacation to Maine, I had to try it. Only wish I would have bought 2, 1 for here and 1 for home. It worked the very first night. I was amazed. I always have slept with a body pillow between my legs, but it never helped. Thank you, thank you, thank you. Update. Ive had the pillow for a week. Just bought another one for home. I am in Maine so im leaving the first one here and the other has already arrived at my home. I forgot about the savings code. But i bought it already. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nana In Florida

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping much better
customer_reviews.text: I always prefer to sleep on my right side but when I do in order to relieve the pain, I have to move my left leg so that my knee is tucked securely into my right thigh and that was the only way for relief...until I bought this foam knee pillow. I still move the left leg but with resting my knee with the foam pillow strapped on and onto my inner right thigh, the pain relief was immediately noticeable and no longer did I have to move it so far up. Works really good for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting Comfort 100% Pure...
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first night it came. It is an excellent help for people with my condition. I really enjoyed it. My pain didn’t disappear all together, but this knee pillow brings great comfort. My son loves it and I ordered one for him for Christmas. He also suffered from knee pain. I cannot live without this pillow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alta

customer_reviews.title: Great! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I always sleep on my side, been having back problems because of the lack of space in between my legs. I finally purchased this, let me tell you it relieved my back pain! The strap is 100% needed, and you don’t ever feel it, the pillow “travels” with you while you sleep and the pillow stays in place and molds into your next formation.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: First good nights of sleep in a long, long time
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back spinal issues, and even with trying different (normal) pillows, I had severe back pain that would wake me up by about 2 AM every night. I've gone about a week of using this Everlasting knee pillow, and the lower back pain while in bed is gone. GONE. It's amazing. The strap is a huge thing here - don't get a knee pillow without one, as it keeps the thing attached to you if you flip back and forth much, as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: No more hip pain
customer_reviews.text: I love the strap because it holds onto my leg without getting lost under the blankets. I even use it without the strap too. It is a perfect size to pack for travel and for a home for every evening use. The first night I used this I woke up with no hip or leg pain. I wish I had bought this sooner. If you were like me where you put a pillow between your leg to sleep this will be a great recommendation to get for yourself or someone you love. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 2 weeks now and it has helped with the constant pain i have with my hips while sleeping. I have actually been able to sleep from when I fall asleep to when the alarm goes off. It has been years since that has happened. Of course it’s a little bit odd having it straped to my leg but I actually got used to it really quickly. Once you are lying on your side it comforms well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amerimom03

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this the very first night, I could feel great improvement the next morning. I am a side sleeper. I have osteoarthritis and right hip and have been advised to have a total hip replacement this cause me to wake up 4 or 5 time per night with pain. With this pillow I did not wake up with pain for the first time in month. It was slightly warm with the pillow but I will take a little warm in exchange for pain.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell that won’t go away
customer_reviews.text: I never managed to use the product because the toxic chemical smell it had when I opened it never went away. I had to take it outside because it was stinking up the whole house. I gave it several days to off gas and then had to return it because it never got better. Don’t waste your money, try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Terbie

customer_reviews.title: Helps alleviate hip and knee pressure
customer_reviews.text: This item is super great! Needed to use a pillow when sleeping due to knee on knee pressure and uncomfortable hip pain. This little pillow helped me sleep better and has helped with the pain. It’s soft, arrived fast and the cover is removable for washing. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect. It protects your hip after surgery. My last hip surgery I purchased a pillow shaped like this one, but it was hard foam and held the legs too far apart to be comfortable for side sleeping. No problem with this pillow. One note, the cover is hard to get on and off for washing. Having said that I wish I had purchased a second cover.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in an awful way and too thin
customer_reviews.text: This knee pillow was shipped rolled up in plastic bag and wont take shape it's supposed to (see picture) it's also not nearly thick enough in the middle. I bought this knee pillow cause the strap but wish I had bought brand I bought for my current pillow cause I'm not happy with this one. I wouldn't suggest buying this knee pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rab

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this thing is great! So comfy to sleep with and totally worked, stayed put throughout the night. It's lightweight and comfy. I was worried that the center was too narrow to make any difference but it's awesome. If you have any lower back pain or hip pain, try this. My chiro recommended a pillow between the knees at night and this is so much better than struggling with a regular size pillow all night.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service and product top notch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never dealt with a company with such excellent customer service. I emailed them with an issue I was having with the cover from a purchase in 2018. They immediately sent me a brand new pillow and cover. I am amazed and recommend this company and the Knee pillow. Its great for my hip bursitis. I have to sleep on my side due to vertigo and now my hip doesn’t hurt anymore with this pillow. Great company. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marycai

customer_reviews.title: Helps with lower back pain - better than normal pillow
customer_reviews.text: Keeping my bones straight when sleeping really helps with my lower back pain. This pillow works much better than using just a normal pillow, the curved shape keeps it in place. I dont always use the strap, but thats a nice feature to ensure it stays right where I need it. Sometimes I sleep with one leg forward (instead of both legs directly on top of each other) thats when the strap really comes in handy, I strap it to my top leg & can still maintain a good skeletal frame. If I roll over in my sleep the pillow stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Soft...good value.....but.......
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this, but, despite the strap, did not stay in place...to be fair, I'm a restless sleeper and tend to toss and turn a lot. If you sleep like a statue this'll probably work well for you, but not those of us the move around a lot and possibly levitate in our sleep.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the strap
customer_reviews.text: The strap did not stay connected and they sent me a new one that did not work either. Then they refunded my money through Amazon, which I did not ask for or expect. I believe that the knee pillow with the strap in an outstanding idea but the execution is faulty. I only asked that Everlasting Comfort fix the issue with stronger hook and loop attachments (Velcro) for their future customers. I do not want to hurt Everlasting Comfort and I DO NOT want anything from Everlasting Comfort. Just fix the problem
customer_reviews.author: Westy

customer_reviews.title: Velcro wears out in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this knee pillow just under a year ago, and the velcro on the sides that received the velcro strap and the velcro on the strap itself are completely worn rendering the pillow useless since the whole point of using it instead of a regular pillow is that the strap keeps it in place through the night. I haven't done anything unusual with it, and I've washed the cover and strap only about 3 times. If less than a year of use is all you expect, other than that, it's a great product, and I the difference between knees together and just a few inches apart is huge for back/spine/hips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healed my sciatic nerve pain in 1 night
customer_reviews.text: This pillow cured me of 4 months of shooting sciatic nerve pain. I was hesitant to buy this pillow. Thinking way too many great reviews. Must be rigged. BUT, the diagram showed relief for exactly where my pain was located. So I bought it thinking I could always return it if it doesn't work. Well, it was amazing. Planning on buying another one. I was in so much pain every morning. It was taking me a half hour or more to get to the bathroom in the morning. First night with this pillow and I got out of bed in the morning 100% pain free. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wires

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick thighs
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a decent product for someone with thin thighs that don't touch. As someone with very thick thighs, it did not provide enough separation to be comfortable. It needs to have more surface area, to cover more of the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Helps with sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having a problem with sciatica and using this pillow has made a huge difference. I like the Velcro strap that holds it in place and doesn’t slip. It keeps my back in a good position while I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Received used and unsanitary packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Pillow looked used and was extrangely packed: 1 extra empty bag, no earplugs as stated, a stick jump out of box and what is worse: found an unhealthy piece of used paper towel with a black thing inside. Has to return this health hazard packed pillow!!! Very unhappy with vendor and Amazon! Where is quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have neck and neck pain and had surgery a few years ago. I toss and turn frequently trying to get relief. I probably only sleep 6 hours a night. After using this knee pillow for the last several nights; I now sleep harder, don’t toss and turn as much, sleep longer, and I no longer have lower back pain. I really can’t believe I sleep this good just from a knee pillow. I literally just slept a hard 12 hours on a Sunday. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: hubja

customer_reviews.title: Great size and the strap keeps pillow in place!
customer_reviews.text: I love the strap that this pillow has, which keeps it in place throughout the night without being uncomfortable. Also, the zipper that you open to wash the exterior seems like it's located in such a way that you can actually get it back on once you wash it. These design aspects of the pillow seem to overcome the two problems I have had with similar pillows, so I am very happy with it! For anyone with lower back pain or back surgeries or hip issues, this pillow is a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. It is very comfortable to sleep with. When I turn over it turns with me. No readjusting because the pillow has shifted during sleep movement. I can also use the knee pillow to do my physical therapy. I feel like I'm getting a better night's sleep using the knee pillow. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great knee pillow! What's interesting is that I really don't need to put the Velcro tab around my knee to keep the unit in place. It pretty much stays in place for some reason and I don't need to adjust the pillow when I turn over in bed!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyheart

customer_reviews.title: The strap is great for keeping the pillow in place.
customer_reviews.text: I just had a total hip replacement, and this pillow is perfect for assuring I don't break my hip dislocation precautions while I sleep. I can sleep on my side again without worrying about my hip position. When the hip precautions are lifted in a month or two, I will probably still use the pillow but without the strap. I thought the earplugs were a pointless bonus until a barking dog woke me up. They tuned out to come in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overnight lower back pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: Ive suffered from lower back pain for a long long time due to bulging discs and my chiropractor said to try one of these. Id wake up in the worst pain that even rolling over was excruciating and sneezing would feel like i threw out my back. This came yesterday and i woke up today with hardly any pain! I almost cried in happiness. I highly recommend it! Buying my wife one now
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graham

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work as Promised
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than it appeared in the description and it was virtually impossible to comfortably use. I felt completely duped because I couldn't do anything with this small, hard "cushion" except return it as quickly as I could.
customer_reviews.author: wichitagirl71

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on first washing.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable for the most part but difficult to use the whole night because you remain in the same position. The problem with this pillow is when you wash the cover it is very difficult to put the pillow back in. Now I am unable to close the zipper at all as there is something wrong with it. I would recommend washing the whole thing to avoid having a problem (or just choose a different pillow brand.)
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Works without squishing too much
customer_reviews.text: Being mid-point in pregnancy my hips are killing me when sleeping. I bought this as I was desperate to get relief somehow. I talked to my physical therapist who recommended putting it below my knee somewhere between the knee and ankle. This works wonders...I even bring it on trips with me! I was afraid that it would squish down in the middle and just disappear but so far it seems to be holding up and benefiting me, so regardless that it does squish somewhat it still does help a LOT. I would recommend. The cover has a zipper so I don't worry about leaning it. The cover is also very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve low-back pain
customer_reviews.text: Using this type of pillow was suggested by my physical therapist to help relieve pain in lower back and right leg sciatic nerve. Although I was skeptical, I tried using just a regular pillow, which did help but way too bulky. I decided to buy this pillow and am very happy I did. It really does help. Because of the size/shape of the pillow, I have even gotten good at turning from one side to the other in bed without losing the pillow. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna J. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Completely regret.
customer_reviews.text: Bought product for my husband for Father’s Day. It was sent in a small box and extremely compressed inside. It’s still compressed and misshapen after 72+ hours of waiting for it to expand. Complete waste on money and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MaKaylaB

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNSATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Pillow was compressed to ship which is understandable. Hours and hours later it still has not returned to form. The inner pillow actually seems like it is deformed. It is definitely not as firm as I would have hoped.......not worth $25..........I would definitely like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Green

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nothing like it shows online. Due to how the product is shipped it was totally squished and not even usable. I let it rest for a week to give it a chance thinking it would puff up. It stayed as pictured. To top it off the company sends several emails to review their product, even long after it had been returned. I don’t like to write bad reviews, but as you insist, here ya go! One star! Please stop with the emails. Anyone looking for a good knee pillow I highly recommend NATUMAX knee pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D

customer_reviews.title: Helped me sleep better than I have in weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I've been tossing and turning instead of sleeping for days, getting about four hours of sleep a night at most. Last night we opened up the box with this pillow in it, and it felt strange for a minute, but I fell asleep instantly and slept for eight hours. I don't know for sure that it was the pillow, but that was the only thing that was different. I've been using a regular bed pillow until now, and this was definitely more comfortable. I really like the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works well, just not perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for propping your legs apart and helps with back pain. I did however notice that when using this ove the body pillow I normally use that my right knee started hurting from lack of support. I have tried placing it between my knees more but it doesn't work as well for that. If you don't have a knee issue (didnt know I had one) it should work really well and is comfortable and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: coopdavillage

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Comfy! not bulky/eases hip/knee/back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I only slept with it for one night so far but it was some of the best sleep I’ve had in such a long time. I woke up with no hip pain and no lower back pain and I was so cozy. I did not even want to get out of bed. It makes a real difference and fits right between my knees or thighs and the strap definitely makes it. It’s not bulky. I toss and turn usually when I sleep but it stayed on. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Loledaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Too Thin in Middle
customer_reviews.text: Great product, incredibly soft tobthe touch and comfortable. but it’s too thin in the middle. When you put it between your legs, your knees can still touch, and I am a small person. I can only imagine the bigger the person the worse it is. Just needs to be 1” bigger in middle so your knees don’t knock together. Then 5 stars since it really does work well. Not sure why no one else is really saying this in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The outside material forms pills too easily. The zipper is extremely poor and went off the track far too easily. Flattens way too much when using it. Not nearly enough support. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knee pillow. I had been having some hip pain and I decided to try this out and I think it worked well. I'm also a very hot sleeper and I think the pillow did stay cooler overnight--more than others i've tried. My only issue is that it's probably a bit larger than I would like... I'm a 5'5" petite person and this pillow feels very chunky/large between my legs. I adjusted to it ok, but it might be too large for a smaller person.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this! I have been using another pillow between my knees. It helped...when it stayed in place. This is sooooo much better. It stays in place all night. The memory foam is very comfortable and the thickness is perfect. The velcro strap is strong and stays all night. My hip pain is relieved and my lower back is much better.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: This pillow helps!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this kind of pillow until the day I ordered it - and had no idea that sleeping in one's side could be troublesome. I've only had the pillow for two days (nights!) and. suffering from spinal stenosis, I already feel a difference - an improvement - when I get out of bed in the morning. While I am already so pleased with the pillow, I am hoping to be getting better with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Zwiebach

customer_reviews.title: Little tiny miracle pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny pillow so much. It’s not like an enormous maternity pillow that you have to commit to one side for the entire night or wake up everyone in the neighborhood trying to switch sides (it’s literally like wrestling a bear). This little thing helps keep my hips aligned and has really helped with syphysis pubis dysfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Shye Marshall

customer_reviews.title: At Last!
customer_reviews.text: After doing many things to relieve my lumbar & sciatic pain & finding them successful initially but becoming much less so, I decided to try this knee pillow. WOW! Immediately all my pain was resolved & this is saying a lot, because at one point I could barely get out of bed. OK, like a few others have said, the strap was too long; but DUH!...just tie a loop-like knot on one end close to the velcro (so it won't irritate your dainty little skin) & it shortens it right up.
customer_reviews.author: pearliegirl

customer_reviews.title: My chiropractor recommended sleeping on my sides with a pillow between the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had sciatica pain on my left side and noticed that my sleeping habits wasn't helping. My chiropractor recommended sleeping on my sides with a pillow between the legs, but I decided to try this product instead, and it has been amazing. It stays between the legs and it sets the back straight. I'd highly recommend this to anyone with lower back issues.
customer_reviews.author: llyybbss

customer_reviews.title: Good but the strap stretches
customer_reviews.text: This works great for relieving lower back pain. I would have given it five stars but the strap stretched after less than a month of nightly use. Once the strap stretched I had problems keeping the pillow in place. The velcro on the strap and the pillow have also lost their ability to stick. Although it works for back pain I would not recommend it. The problems with the strap defeats the purpose of keeping it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with femoral acetabular impingement syndrome this past year. This little pillow has been a godsend to keep my legs in the position I'm comfortable with. its memory foam but unlike others I've tried, it stays firm enough not to flatten out during use. I'm not an ad, just a guy with a pillow he bought online.
customer_reviews.author: Beer is food
